install.name: Search - K2 Categories
install.author: Techjoomla
install.description: This plugin extends the default K2 search plugin to search in category names and descriptions as well.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: The number of items to return when performing a search.

param.name: search_tags
param.label: Enable searching in tags
param.description: Select if you want to search item's tags. Note that this can be very slow on large sites.

param.name: search_categories
param.label: Enable searching in categories
param.description: Select if you want to search the category names and descriptions
